name: 句法學研討
comment: 教室位於雲和街大樓2樓（地址：雲和街1號），外系及外校學生需申請門禁權限。
goals: an introduction to contemporary work in syntactic theory

students should be able to understand the main ideas behind the theory (especially with respect to how it differs from its predecessor - Government & Binding) and also to read and analyze Minimalist articles critically
syllabus:
Week 1 Presentation, Syllabus, Preview  
Week 2 GB vs. Minimalism: Representations vs. Derivations  
Week 3  Bare Phrase Structure, Merge and Theta Theory  
Week 4  The Copy Theory of Movement  
Week 5 The Copy Theory of Movement  
Week 6 Case, Checking Theory, Agree  
Week 7 Case, Checking Theory, Agree  
Week 8 Case, Checking Theory, Agree  
Week 9 Control  
Week 10 Head Movement, PF Movement  
Week 11 The PF component: Linearization  
Week 12  The PF component: Linearization  
Week 13  Sideward Movement, Parallel Merge  
Week 14  Cyclic Spell-Out, Phases, Feature inheritance  
Week 15  Cyclic Spell-Out, Phases, Feature inheritance  
Week 16  Term paper due
prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
